page.title: 14CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS
page.content: There are 21 clubs and organisations in Weston 6 of which are sports, Badminton, Tennis, Squash,Netball, Football, and Cricket.{Badminton}is held in Weston Village Hall so is the {Diamond Club}and{Luncheon Club}both for people over sixties. A{Clinic}is held there for babies. The{Tennis Club and the{Football Club}meet at the recreation ground.{Squash}and{Cricket are held at Weston Park.In Weston a {Singers Club}meet every Wednesday and {Bell Ringing}is held at the Church on Thursdays.A{Mums and Toddlers}group is held at Weston Nursery School on Thursdays. There is a{Youth Club}which has its own rooms at the back of the Village Hall.{Junior Church, Kononia, {Guides}and{Brownies}are held at the Village Hall it self.{Christian {Fellowship}meet at various homes.There is also a{Meals on Wheels}Sevice.
